title:
Why since 2015 the VA clinic in Wilmington, still can not use the water in the building.  I am sure if this was a commercial building it would have been fixed by now.





If Route 140 was finished this would take a lot of traffic off the Cape Fear Bridge, and another bridge would not be needed and save a lot of money. Why has 140 taken so long?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/05/why-does-the-va-clinic-in-wilmington-still-have-problems-with-its-water-when-its-been-open-since-2015/
